data.name: Victorian characters for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
7 Victorian characters (girls and boys) for clip maker


Get 7 Victorian characters (girls and boys):
Brian
Camila
Edward
Eleanor
Gianna
Layla
Madison

In just a few clicks you can create video clips, movies, live action videos, animation, image art, visual novels, stories, manga, comics, wallpapers or just have a fun making characters behave as you would like. Specially created for beginners, non-designers, professionals and artists to bring your stories to life.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Victorian characters for Clip maker

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters can not be nude, you are not able to take off all clothes. And all characters of this DLC are loaded with special textures. Those textures has painted over the intimate parts of the body.
